item.title: Vote now for the top 100 companies in the world!
item.description: Being nominated for an award is always an honor, even if it’s a common sentiment. We want to express our gratitude to the Oscars for the recognition. Voting for Dynamics World’s Top 100 Most Influential Dynamics People list is officially open. Both Steve and I were pleasantly surprised and humbled to be nominated this year. Steve received his nomination for his technical blog posts that dive into the core of development issues and Dynamics GP.
